segments.text: How do you feel about teaching my friend how to read ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How old is your friend and why doesn't he know how to read ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He's 78 and he's a new emigrant from South America and he's never been to school .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Does he even know how to speak English ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . But I thought that you could start with reading and then go from there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That was very thoughtful of you to volunteer me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Come on . You're great at teaching and I know you will love him . He's adorable !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , all right . Have him come over here for dinner . But you get to make dinner !
segments.speaker: S2
